document.full_text: a key republican lawmaker on monday urged hundreds of tiny banks to "slay the dragons" when they battle congress over new limits on debit card fees that could hurt their profits.
document.title: lawmaker on debit fee curbs: "slay the dragons"
lines_and_colors: a key republican lawmaker on monday urged hundreds of tiny banks to "slay the dragons" when they battle congress over new limits on debit card fees that could hurt their profits.
